text: Hatman, qit'ahoi ohan ʙarojam ʙijovared [va ruji ham ʙicined]», to vaqte komilan mijoni du kuhro ʙaroʙar soxt [va pusond. Sipas] guft: «[Dar atrofi devorai ohanin otas ʙijafruzed va] dar on ʙidamed». [Onon cunin kardand] To vaqte on [qitaoti ohan]-ro gudoxta kard; [sipas] guft: «[Aknun] misi oʙsuda ʙarojam ʙijovared, to ruji on [devor] ʙirezam»
